article_title: The Religious Liberty Law that Protected Hobby Lobby from Governmentt Coercion
article_text:

article_metadata.description: An important religious liberty law succeeded. In Hobby Lobby RFRA provided the Supreme Court with a mechanism for weighing competing claims in our society.
